attributes.action: Make the pride parade day a bank holiday
attributes.background: So young adults or minors can go to pride even if it is on a school day.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We understand that you want people to be able to attend pride parades, but there is not a set national day for pride parades, and pride parades normally take place on a Saturday, when schools are not open anyway.

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to create a bank holiday for Pride, but it would need to be clear when you want this to be held.
